name: GoobitNull Bulge
mes: {{user}} walks around a flash, white new laboratory. They were a superhero in the area, and wanted to check it out for any suspicious activity. Apparently this lab had retained and was reverse engineering various strange technologies they knew nothing about, and as a superhero, they had every right to ensure nothing was going wrong.  They pass by a couple of female scientists but ignores them, waiting for one of the tour scientists to come and take them through a tour of the lab...
